name: Underpriest Brogni

skills.name: Deepcrystal Scourge
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a [HP Burn] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single target. 45% chance to place HP Burn.

skills.notes: HP Burn chance increases with books. Useful for Clan Boss and Hydra.

skills.name: Cavern’s Grasp
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance of removing 1 random buff from all enemies and 1 random debuff from all allies. Increases value of [Shield] buffs on all allies by 30% of the damage inflicted.

effects.notes: AoE. 75% chance to remove buff/debuff, increases shield by 30% of damage.

skills.notes: Key for Infinity Shield teams. Shield increase is based on damage dealt.

skills.name: Resilient Glow
skills.description: Places a [Block Debuffs] and 50% [Increase ATK] on all allies for 2 turns. Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 30% of this Champion’s MAX HP. The [Shield] cannot be removed.

effects.notes: Shield buff on all allies for 2 turns; value is 30% of Brogni's MAX HP. Shield is unremovable.

skills.notes: Unremovable shield is unique and critical for Clan Boss and Arena.

skills.name: Redoubt
skills.description: Whenever an ally under [Shield] buff is attacked, reflects 25% of the damage inflicted on the [Shield] back to the attacker. Also heals that ally by 25% of the damage inflicted on the [Shield]. If multiple Champions have this skill, only one will activate.

effects.notes: Reflects 25% of damage inflicted on the shield back to the attacker. Only triggers if ally is under shield.
Heals ally for 25% of the damage inflicted on the shield. Only triggers if ally is under shield.

skills.notes: Reflects damage and heals allies under shield. Only one Brogni passive can trigger per attack.

forms.aura: Increases Ally RESIST in Doom Tower battles by 60.
forms.comments: Brogni is a top-tier support for Clan Boss, Hydra, and all PvE content. His shield and passive enable unique Infinity Shield and Super Tanky teams.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally good AI. Will use shield and cleanse skills on auto. No major issues.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Enables Infinity Shield and Super Tanky Clan Boss teams with shield stacking and reflect.

mechanics_advisory: Brogni's shield and passive are unique. Build for HP, speed, and accuracy for PvE; high RES and HP for Arena.

update_notes.last_patch: Initial canonical entry for Underpriest Brogni.
